meanings.definition: A person who works at a carnival.
meanings.sent1: The carneys set up the games and rides at the carnival.
meanings.sent2: I saw the carneys selling tickets and popcorn at the carnival.
meanings.sent3: The carneys joked with the visitors, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The carneys were the heart and soul of the carnival, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The colorful outfits of the carneys added a festive touch to the carnival.

meanings.definition: To engage in the activities of a carnival.
meanings.sent1: We carneys worked hard to make sure the carnival was a success.
meanings.sent2: They carneys entertained the crowd with their performances at the carnival.
meanings.sent3: After a long day of carneying, we all enjoyed a well-deserved break.
meanings.sent4: The children's laughter filled the air as we carneyed around the carnival.
meanings.sent5: She carneys with enthusiasm, bringing energy to the carnival atmosphere.
